title: KING OF THROWS! | Kick the Ant Hive ICYFAR G2
excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players sent in their StarCraft 2 replays where they had to swarm their enemy with a ton of low tier units. Here’s a fun game of terran versus zerg completing the challenge in humorous fashion.   NEW ICYFAR CHALLENGE: "Resurrection
